To compile flip,

	c++ flipsource.cpp
	
Then

	mv a.out fliparm
	
Then copy the Intel version of flip to this folder and rename it

	flipintel
	
Finally

	lipo fliparm flipintel -create -output flip
	
Then codesign:

	codesign -s "Developer ID Application: Richard Koch" --force --timestamp --options=runtime flip
	
To test

	lipo -archs flip
